titleStmt.title: An ordinance of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament Together with rules and directions concerning suspention from the sacrament of the Lords Supper in cases of ignorance and scandall. Also the names of such ministers and others that are appointed triers and judges of the ability of elders in the twelve classes within the province of London. Die Lunæ 20. Octob. 1645. Ordered by the Lords assembled in Parliament, that the ordinance, rules, and directions concerning suspension from the Lords Supper, with the names of the ministers and others to try the elders, be forthwith printed and published. Joh. Brown Cler. Parliamentorum.
Proceedings. 1645-10-20.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Iohn Wright at the Kings Head in the old Bayley,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.

place.placeName: the Kings Head in the old Bayley
